name: vscode-map-preview
description: VSCode extension for visually previewing geospatial file content (GeoJSON, KML, etc) on a map

editor/title.when: resourceExtname == .geojson || resourceExtname == .kml || resourceExtname == .csv || resourceExtname == .gpx || resourceExtname == .igc || resourceExtname == .gml
resourceExtname == .geojson || resourceExtname == .kml || resourceExtname == .csv || resourceExtname == .gpx || resourceExtname == .igc || resourceExtname == .gml

map.preview.defaultBaseLayer.description: The default base layer to use for map previews

map.preview.customLayers.base.description: An array of custom base layers

name.description: The name of this base layer

sourceParams.description: A series of key/value parameters for defining this base layer's source

map.preview.apikeys.stadiamaps.description: API key for Stadia Maps. This is required if a stamen or stadia layer is your default base layer

map.preview.apikeys.bing.description: API key for Bing Maps. This is required if bing layer is your default base layer

map.preview.debug.dumpContentPath.description: A file path to dump the current preview content to. Used for debugging purposes. Disabled (null) by default

map.preview.coordinateDisplay.format.description: A format string describing how coordinates are to be formatted. The format string must contain the {x} and {y} coordinate placeholder tokens

map.preview.style.line.stroke.color.description: The default color to use for line strokes. This is an rgba(r, g, b, a) expression. NOTE: Doesn't affect KML if its features have been configured with inline styles

map.preview.style.line.stroke.width.description: The default thickness of line strokes. NOTE: Doesn't affect KML if its features have been configured with inline styles

map.preview.style.polygon.stroke.color.description: The default color to use for polygon borders. This is an rgba(r, g, b, a) expression. NOTE: Doesn't affect KML if its features have been configured with inline styles

map.preview.style.polygon.stroke.width.description: The default thickness of polygon borders. NOTE: Doesn't affect KML if its features have been configured with inline styles

map.preview.style.polygon.fill.color.description: The default color to use for polygon fills. This is an rgba(r, g, b, a) expression. NOTE: Doesn't affect KML if its features have been configured with inline styles

map.preview.style.vertex.enabled.description: Controls whether to style vertices of line and polygon features

map.preview.style.vertex.radius.description: The default vertex radius in screen-space. Used to style vertices in lines and polygon layers. If `map.preview.style.vertex.enabled` is false, this setting has no effect. NOTE: Doesn't affect KML if its features have been configured with inline styles

map.preview.style.vertex.fill.color.description: The default vertex color. Used to style vertices in lines and polygon layers. If `map.preview.style.vertex.enabled` is false, this setting has no effect. NOTE: Doesn't affect KML if its features have been configured with inline styles

map.preview.style.point.radius.description: The default point radius in screen-space. NOTE: Doesn't affect KML if its features have been configured with inline styles

map.preview.style.point.stroke.color.description: The default color to use for point borders. This is an rgba(r, g, b, a) expression. NOTE: Doesn't affect KML if its features have been configured with inline styles

map.preview.style.point.stroke.width.description: The default thickness of point borders. NOTE: Doesn't affect KML if its features have been configured with inline styles

map.preview.style.point.fill.color.description: The default color to use for point fills. This is an rgba(r, g, b, a) expression. NOTE: Doesn't affect KML if its features have been configured with inline styles

map.preview.selectionStyle.line.stroke.c.description: The default color to use for line strokes for selected features. This is an rgba(r, g, b, a) expression. NOTE: Doesn't affect KML if its features have been configured with inline styles

map.preview.selectionStyle.line.stroke.w.description: The default thickness of line strokes for selected features. NOTE: Doesn't affect KML if its features have been configured with inline styles

map.preview.selectionStyle.polygon.strok.description: The default color to use for polygon borders for selected features. This is an rgba(r, g, b, a) expression. NOTE: Doesn't affect KML if its features have been configured with inline styles
The default thickness of polygon borders for selected features. NOTE: Doesn't affect KML if its features have been configured with inline styles

map.preview.selectionStyle.polygon.fill..description: The default color to use for polygon fills for selected features. This is an rgba(r, g, b, a) expression. NOTE: Doesn't affect KML if its features have been configured with inline styles

map.preview.selectionStyle.point.stroke..description: The default color to use for point borders for selected features. This is an rgba(r, g, b, a) expression. NOTE: Doesn't affect KML if its features have been configured with inline styles
The default thickness of point borders for selected features. NOTE: Doesn't affect KML if its features have been configured with inline styles

map.preview.selectionStyle.point.fill.co.description: The default color to use for point fills for selected features. This is an rgba(r, g, b, a) expression. NOTE: Doesn't affect KML if its features have been configured with inline styles

definition.description: The proj4js definition for this EPSG code. Consult https://epsg.io/ for the correct proj4js definition

map.preview.projections.description: A list of additional map projections to register with this extension. Such projections can be used with the `Map Preview (with projection)` command

xColumn.description: The name of the column containing the X point coordinate

yColumn.description: The name of the column containing the Y point coordinate

map.preview.csvColumnAliases.description: A list of case-insensitive column name pairs to look for X/Y coordinates when attempting to preview a given CSV file

map.preview.declutterLabels.description: Indicates whether to declutter labels of features. Useful when previewing label-heavy data like point KML files
